Text:
Just finishing listening to the last part of this now.  A stunning collection, I was looking for something to unwind - and ...  
You saved my life!  

Thank you omdaru, you have also given me lots of new names to Google and read interesting things about.  

Again...  thank-you for such wonderful collections, I am downloading the rest now!  

But who is Vlad?  I would be very interested to know...  you can email me if you want at:  

manny_avatar [@] hotmail [.] com
